trans-unit.source: Represents a MIME protocol Content-Type header.
trans-unit.target: 表示 MIME 协议的 Content-type 标头。

trans-unit.source: The information in the ContentType class is used to describe the data contained in an e-mail message in such a way that software that displays e-mail can present the content in an appropriate manner.
trans-unit.target: ContentType 类中的信息用于描述的方式显示电子邮件的软件在适当的方式种呈现内容的电子邮件中包含的数据。

trans-unit.source: ContentType is used with the <xref:System.Net.Mail.Attachment> class to specify the type of content in the attachment.
trans-unit.target: 与使用 ContentType<xref:System.Net.Mail.Attachment>类附件中指定的内容的类型。</xref:System.Net.Mail.Attachment>

trans-unit.source: The syntax of the Content-Type header is described in RFC 2045 Section 5.1.
trans-unit.target: RFC 2045 部分 5.1 中描述的内容类型标头的语法。

trans-unit.source: RFC 2046 provides detailed information about MIME media types and their parameters.
trans-unit.target: RFC 2046 提供有关 MIME 媒体类型和其参数的详细的信息。

trans-unit.source: These RFCs are available at [http://www.ietf.org](http://www.ietf.org/).
trans-unit.target: 这些 Rfc 位于[http://www.ietf.org](http://www.ietf.org/)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new default instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mime.ContentType"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新默认实例<xref href="System.Net.Mime.ContentType"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentType.MediaType%2A> property to `"application/octet-stream"`.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化<xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentType.MediaType%2A>属性`"application/octet-stream"`。</xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentType.MediaType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mime.ContentType"></xref> class using the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Net.Mime.ContentType"></xref>类使用指定的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The syntax of the `contentType` string is described in RFC 2045 Section 5.1 available at [http://www.ietf.org](http://www.ietf.org/).
trans-unit.target: 语法`contentType`字符串部分所述 RFC 2045 5.1 在[http://www.ietf.org](http://www.ietf.org/)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String>, for example, `"text/plain; charset=us-ascii"`, that contains the MIME media type, subtype, and optional parameters.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>，例如， `"text/plain; charset=us-ascii"`，，包含 MIME 媒体类型、 子类型，以及可选的参数。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: contentType is .
trans-unit.target: contentTypeis .

trans-unit.source: contentType is ("").
trans-unit.target: contentTypeis ("").

trans-unit.source: contentType is in a form that cannot be parsed.
trans-unit.target: contentType无法分析的窗体中。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the boundary parameter included in the Content-Type header represented by this instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此实例所表示的内容类型标头中包含边界参数的值。

trans-unit.source: In the following example of a Content-Type header, the value of the Boundary parameter is "`-----boundary---0`".
trans-unit.target: 在以下示例中的内容类型标头，边界参数的值是"`-----boundary---0`"。

trans-unit.source: `content-type: multipart/mixed; boundary=-----boundary---0` Set this property to `null` or <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> to remove the boundary information from the header.
trans-unit.target: `content-type: multipart/mixed; boundary=-----boundary---0`将此属性设置为`null`或<xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>从标头中删除的边界信息。</xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The syntax of the Content-Type header is described in RFC 2045 Section 5.1.
trans-unit.target: RFC 2045 部分 5.1 中描述的内容类型标头的语法。

trans-unit.source: An in-depth discussion of the boundary parameter is contained in RFC 2046 Section 5.1.1.
trans-unit.target: 边界参数的深度讨论包含在 RFC 2046 第 5.1.1 节中。

trans-unit.source: These RFCs are available at [http://www.ietf.org](http://www.ietf.org/).
trans-unit.target: 这些 Rfc 位于[http://www.ietf.org](http://www.ietf.org/)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the value associated with the boundary parameter.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>，其中包含与边界参数关联的值。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the charset parameter included in the Content-Type header represented by this instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此实例所表示的内容类型标头中包含的字符集参数的值。

trans-unit.source: In the following example of a Content-Type header, the value of the CharSet property is "`us-ascii`".
trans-unit.target: 在以下示例中的内容类型标头，CharSet 属性的值是"`us-ascii`"。

trans-unit.source: `content-type: application/x-myType; charset=us-ascii` Set this property to `null` or <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> to remove the charset information from the header.
trans-unit.target: `content-type: application/x-myType; charset=us-ascii`将此属性设置为`null`或<xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>去 charset 信息从标头。</xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A grammar that details the syntax of the Content-Type header is described in RFC 2045 Section 5.1.
trans-unit.target: RFC 2045 5.1 节描述了详细说明的内容类型标头的语法语法。

trans-unit.source: An in-depth discussion of the charset parameter is contained in RFC 2046 Section 4.1.2.
trans-unit.target: Charset 参数的深度讨论包含在 RFC 2046 第 4.1.2 节中。

trans-unit.source: These RFCs are available at [http://www.ietf.org](http://www.ietf.org/).
trans-unit.target: 这些 Rfc 位于[http://www.ietf.org](http://www.ietf.org/)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the value associated with the charset parameter.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>，其中包含与 charset 参数关联的值。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the content-type header of the specified <xref href="System.Net.Mime.ContentType"></xref> object is equal to the content-type header of this object.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否指定的内容类型标头<xref href="System.Net.Mime.ContentType"></xref>对象是否等于此对象的内容类型标头。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.Mime.ContentType"></xref> object to compare with this object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.Mime.ContentType"> </xref>对象与此对象进行比较。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the content-type headers are the same; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果内容类型标头都相同;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Determines the hash code of the specified <xref href="System.Net.Mime.ContentType"></xref> object
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的哈希代码<xref href="System.Net.Mime.ContentType"></xref>对象

trans-unit.source: An integer hash value.
trans-unit.target: 整数哈希值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the media type value included in the Content-Type header represented by this instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此实例所表示的内容类型标头中包含的媒体类型值。

trans-unit.source: In the following example of a Content-Type header, the value of the MediaType property is `"application/x-myType"`.
trans-unit.target: 在以下示例中的内容类型标头，媒体类型属性的值是`"application/x-myType"`。

trans-unit.source: `content-type: application/x-myType; name=data.xyz` Set this property to `null` or <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> to remove the name information from the header.
trans-unit.target: `content-type: application/x-myType; name=data.xyz`将此属性设置为`null`或<xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>从标头中删除名称信息。</xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The syntax of the Content-Type header is described in RFC 2045 Section 5.1.
trans-unit.target: RFC 2045 部分 5.1 中描述的内容类型标头的语法。

trans-unit.source: RFC 2046 provides detailed information on MIME media types.
trans-unit.target: RFC 2046 MIME 媒体类型提供了详细的信息。

trans-unit.source: These RFCs are available at [http://www.ietf.org](http://www.ietf.org/).
trans-unit.target: 这些 Rfc 位于[http://www.ietf.org](http://www.ietf.org/)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the media type and subtype value.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>包含媒体类型和子类型值。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: This value does not include the semicolon (;) separator that follows the subtype.
trans-unit.target: 此值不包括分号 （;） 分隔符后面子类型。

trans-unit.source: The value specified for a set operation is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 为集运算指定的值<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value specified for a set operation is <xref:System.String> ("").
trans-unit.target: 为集运算指定的值<xref:System.String>("")。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The value specified for a set operation is in a form that cannot be parsed.
trans-unit.target: 为集运算指定的值是无法分析的窗体中。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the name parameter included in the Content-Type header represented by this instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置包含在此实例所表示的内容类型标头名称参数的值。

trans-unit.source: In the following example of a Content-Type header, the value of the Name property is `"data.xyz"`.
trans-unit.target: Name 属性的值是在以下示例中的内容类型标头， `"data.xyz"`。

trans-unit.source: `content-type: application/x-myType; name=data.xyz` A grammar that details the syntax of the Content-Type header is described in RFC 2045 Section 5.1, available at [http://www.ietf.org](http://www.ietf.org/).
trans-unit.target: `content-type: application/x-myType; name=data.xyz`语法，其中详细列出的内容类型标头的语法部分所述 RFC 2045 5.1 中，在[http://www.ietf.org](http://www.ietf.org/)。

trans-unit.source: When specifying content for a <xref:System.Net.Mail.Attachment> as a <xref:System.IO.Stream> or <xref:System.String>, you can use Name to set the name of the file that stores the content on the recipient's system.
trans-unit.target: 指定的内容时<xref:System.Net.Mail.Attachment>作为<xref:System.IO.Stream>或<xref:System.String>，你可以使用名称设置的接收方的系统存储内容的文件的名称。</xref:System.String> </xref:System.IO.Stream> </xref:System.Net.Mail.Attachment>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the value associated with the name parameter.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>，其中包含与名称参数关联的值。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the dictionary that contains the parameters included in the Content-Type header represented by this instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含此实例所表示的内容类型标头中包含的参数的字典。

trans-unit.source: You can set the parameters by specifying the entire Content-Header value when constructing a <xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentType> object or you can add parameters to the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.StringDictionary> returned by the Parameters property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过在构造时指定的整个内容标头值设置参数<xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentType>对象也可以将参数添加到<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.StringDictionary>参数属性返回。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.StringDictionary> </xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentType>

trans-unit.source: When adding a parameter entry to the dictionary, the name of the parameter is the entry's key and the value of the parameter is the entry's value.
trans-unit.target: 参数的名称时将参数项添加到字典中，为项的密钥，参数的值为条目的值。

trans-unit.source: A grammar that details the syntax of the Content-Type header is described in RFC 2045 Section 5.1.
trans-unit.target: RFC 2045 5.1 节描述了详细说明的内容类型标头的语法语法。

trans-unit.source: RFC 2046 provides detailed information on MIME media types and their associated parameters.
trans-unit.target: RFC 2046 MIME 媒体类型和其关联的参数提供详细的信息。

trans-unit.source: These RFCs are available at [http://www.ietf.org](http://www.ietf.org/).
trans-unit.target: 这些 Rfc 位于[http://www.ietf.org](http://www.ietf.org/)。

trans-unit.source: A writable <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.StringDictionary"></xref> that contains name and value pairs.
trans-unit.target: 可写<xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.StringDictionary"></xref>包含名称和值对。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representation of this <xref href="System.Net.Mime.ContentType"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 返回的字符串表示形式这<xref href="System.Net.Mime.ContentType"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The value of the ToString method contains the string used to create this <xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentType>, if one was specified and no property values have been changed.
trans-unit.target: ToString 方法的值包含用于创建此字符串<xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentType>，如果已指定一个且已更改任何属性值。</xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentType>

trans-unit.source: If no string was specified, or one or more property values have changed since this <xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentType> was created, the value of ToString is a string in the format of a Content-Type header that is composed using the current property values.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有指定字符串，或一个或多个属性值已更改，由于这<xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentType>已创建，ToString 的值是由使用的当前属性值的内容类型标头格式的字符串。</xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentType>

trans-unit.source: The string does not include the `"Content-type:"` prefix.
trans-unit.target: 的字符串未包含`"Content-type:"`前缀。

trans-unit.source: The syntax of the Content-Type header is described in RFC 2045 Section 5.1, available at [http://www.ietf.org](http://www.ietf.org/).
trans-unit.target: RFC 2045 部分 5.1 中，在可用中描述的内容类型标头的语法[http://www.ietf.org](http://www.ietf.org/)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the current settings for this <xref href="System.Net.Mime.ContentType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>，包含此的当前设置<xref href="System.Net.Mime.ContentType"> </xref>。</xref:System.String>
